title: AFFORDABLE LUXURY AT ITS BEST! TOP FLOOR+HIGH CEILINGS+AMAZING VIEW
posting_body: ['The residences is spacious, with unique layouts that make traditional boxy apartments pale by comparison.', 'Relax freely in your Four bedroom flex apartments featuring extra high ceilings, pass-through kitchens, oak parquet floors, and oversized windows.', 'residence include walk in closet.', 'This upscale, yet affordable residency offers all of the modern marvels one could ask for.', 'Sunbathe on the wrap terrace, relax at Club 45, engage in some on-site golf with a private putting green, or tone up at the complementary fitness center.', 'No matter what you choose, The building offers many grand opportunities.', 'Located in the bustling financial district of Manhattan the neighborhood is filled with trendy restaurants, galleries, specialty retailers, and historical sites.', 'With its dynamic skyline views, vivacious location, spacious apartments, and modern amenities; you couldn’t ask for a better place to call your home.', 'Come and enjoy the triumph of where the heart and enthusiasm is most visible']
